Original: You are taking that request? It comes
from Ciaran at the Cargo Wharf. It is
rare for him to submit a request...
[Page]
You should inquire into the details
at the Cargo Wharf. I shall await
your swift return...
Translation: You are taking that request? It comes
from Ciaran at the Cargo Wharf. It is
rare for him to submit a request...
[Page]
You should inquire into the details
at the Cargo Wharf. I shall await
your swift return...

Original: Welcome back. Everyone in Tharsis was
surprised to hear that Raht was alive!
[Page]
That boy really has the devil's own
luck... It is a useful trait in an
explorer.
[Page]
I hope the same is true for you.
That you have the devil's own luck
and survive, come what may...
Translation: Welcome back. Everyone in Tharsis was
surprised to hear that Raht was alive!
[Page]
That boy really has the devil's own
luck... It is a useful trait in an
explorer.
[Page]
I hope the same is true for you.
That you have the devil's own luck
and survive, come what may...

Original: Oh, yeh're here about the request?
Seems a regular here saw a downed
skyship in the [Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
There was a man with it. Must've been
attacked by a monster... After I
heard, I felt I had to do something.
[Page]
So I put in a request. I want yeh to
find where that ship went down and
tell me where it is.
[Page]
Once I know, I can send a man out with
supplies and repair tools, right?
So I'm counting on yeh!
Translation: Oh, yeh're here about the request?
Seems a regular here saw a downed
skyship in the [Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0].
[Page]
There was a man with it. Must've been
attacked by a monster... After I
heard, I felt I had to do something.
[Page]
So I put in a request. I want yeh to
find where that ship went down and
tell me where it is.
[Page]
Once I know, I can send a man out with
supplies and repair tools, right?
So I'm counting on yeh!

Original: Ah, did yeh find that crashed
explorer?
Translation: Ah, did yeh find that crashed
explorer?

Original: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Have you found him?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Yeah, didn't think it would be easy.
The Cloudy Stronghold's a big place.
All I can say is, good luck to yeh.
Translation: Yeah, didn't think it would be easy.
The Cloudy Stronghold's a big place.
All I can say is, good luck to yeh.

Original: I wish I had any to give yeh! Do yeh
have any idea who this guy might be?
Translation: I wish I had any to give yeh! Do yeh
have any idea who this guy might be?

Original: Now that's the [Guild] Guild I
know! Then let's get to it. Can yeh
show me on the map where he was?
Translation: Now that's the [Guild] Guild I
know! Then let's get to it. Can yeh
show me on the map where he was?

Original: Hmmm, there, eh? All right. I'll go
ferry him supplies myself!
Translation: Hmmm, there, eh? All right. I'll go
ferry him supplies myself!

Original: I sure didn't see any crashed
explorers where yeh sent me.
[Page]
Yeh can't fool around with this!
A man's life is at stake here!
Give me the real coordinates.
Translation: I sure didn't see any crashed
explorers where yeh sent me.
[Page]
Yeh can't fool around with this!
A man's life is at stake here!
Give me the real coordinates.

Original: Hey, yeh did it! There really was a
crashed explorer, just where yeh
sent me!
[Page]
He talked my ear off, but for some
reason, I couldn't bring myself to
hate the guy.
[Page]
I fixed up his skyship and left him
some supplies. Seemed like he was
zooming off toward Tharsis.
[Page]
That was a good thing yeh did. I left
your reward with the gal at the bar
already, so make sure yeh get it!
Translation: Hey, yeh did it! There really was a
crashed explorer, just where yeh
sent me!
[Page]
He talked my ear off, but for some
reason, I couldn't bring myself to
hate the guy.
[Page]
I fixed up his skyship and left him
some supplies. Seemed like he was
zooming off toward Tharsis.
[Page]
That was a good thing yeh did. I left
your reward with the gal at the bar
already, so make sure yeh get it!

Original: Ah, damn! I forgot to invoice him for
the repair fees! Guess I'll have to
collect the money later...
Translation: Ah, damn! I forgot to invoice him for
the repair fees! Guess I'll have to
collect the money later...

Original: As you cautiously search for the
downed skyship, you hear someone
calling to you from directly below.
[Page]
"Heeeey! Funny meeting you here!
What do you think, seeing me here
like this!?"
[Page]
You lean over the side of the gondola
to see a wrecked skyship and a man
standing beside it.
Translation: As you cautiously search for the
downed skyship, you hear someone
calling to you from directly below.
[Page]
"Heeeey! Funny meeting you here!
What do you think, seeing me here
like this!?"
[Page]
You lean over the side of the gondola
to see a wrecked skyship and a man
standing beside it.

Original: You gasp with surprise... This is the
explorer Raht who disappeared without
a trace!
[Page]
"Hey, long time no see," he says.
"My disease got worse during my last
trip and I collapsed in these lands.
[Page]
"From what I heard later, a passing
explorer carried me to a clinic.
[Page]
"The medic there was really nice. He
asked some explorers to find materials
for a medicine that could cure me.
[Page]
"As you can see, thanks to the stuff
they brought back, my life was saved.
[Page]
"I owe my life to a lot of different
people now. I'm thinking of giving
up this explorer nonsense.
[Page]
"But I wanted to go on one last
journey, just to finish it off.
And I ended up crashing again...
[Page]
"Yeesh! All my stuff burned up and
I can't repair the ship... I just
want to go home on my own skyship!"
Translation: You gasp with surprise... This is the
explorer Raht who disappeared without
a trace!
[Page]
"Hey, long time no see," he says.
"My disease got worse during my last
trip and I collapsed in these lands.
[Page]
"From what I heard later, a passing
explorer carried me to a clinic.
[Page]
"The medic there was really nice. He
asked some explorers to find materials
for a medicine that could cure me.
[Page]
"As you can see, thanks to the stuff
they brought back, my life was saved.
[Page]
"I owe my life to a lot of different
people now. I'm thinking of giving
up this explorer nonsense.
[Page]
"But I wanted to go on one last
journey, just to finish it off.
And I ended up crashing again...
[Page]
"Yeesh! All my stuff burned up and
I can't repair the ship... I just
want to go home on my own skyship!"

Original: You are unsure how to feel about this
development. A range of conflicting
emotions storms through you...
Translation: You are unsure how to feel about this
development. A range of conflicting
emotions storms through you...

Original: [Color:5]What will you do?[Color:0]
Punch him
Leave silently
Smile back
Translation: [Color:5]What will you do?[Color:0]
Punch him
Leave silently
Smile back

Original: What the!? Wh-What was that for!?
That hurt!
Translation: What the!? Wh-What was that for!?
That hurt!

Original: Hm? Huh? Are you... leaving?
Hey... Hey!
Translation: Hm? Huh? Are you... leaving?
Hey... Hey!

Original: You've saved me so many times,
hahaha...
[Page]
But I really need your help this one
last time.
Translation: You've saved me so many times,
hahaha...
[Page]
But I really need your help this one
last time.

Original: You have found the crashed explorer.
You need only remember this location
and report it to the wharf master.
Translation: You have found the crashed explorer.
You need only remember this location
and report it to the wharf master.

Original: You see a man waving to you... If you
tell the wharf master, he will deliver
repair tools for Raht's skyship.
Translation: You see a man waving to you... If you
tell the wharf master, he will deliver
repair tools for Raht's skyship.
